body:
# The San Francisco Manifesto San Fran 2015

The San Francisco Manifesto

Stories, Tales & Memories Told in Whole Truth by Hannah C. Rubin and Zachary R. Clements

May 22,2015 - May 28,2015


  • Public Transportation
  • Restaurant Guide
  • Hannah Birthday Surprise

Hotel Information

The Mosser Hotel 54 4th street, San Francisco
Reservation (Fri 5/22 - Wed 5/27)
tel. 1 (415) 986-4400
Confirmation: 233404313

Flight Information

BOS > SAN FRAN (JETBLUE 833)
[Dept] Logan 8:45 pm Friday May 22nd
[Arrv] San Fran 12:18 am Saturday May 23rd

SAN JOSE> BOS (JETBLUE 472)
[Dept] San Jose 9:18 pm Wednesday May 27th
[Arrv] Logan 5:54 am Thursday May 28th

Hannah Ticket #: 2797575358706
Zach Ticket #: 279757358707


Itinerary

Saturday May 23

- Ferry Market Building (1.4 mi) [1 Ferry building, San Francisco, CA 94111]
- Embarcadero Center (1.0 mi) [Three Embarcadero Center - Off Clay Street]
- Chinatown (1.0 mi) [Between California and Broadway Street]
- Coit Tower (1.8 mi) [1 Telegraph Hill Blvd]
- Lombard Street (1.9 mi)
- Pier 39 (1.9 mi) [Beach Street & The Embarcadero]
- Fishermans Wharf (1.9 mi)(Off Embarcadero North Street)
- Ghirardelli Square (2.0 mi) [900 North Point Street]

*Suggested Route: Ferry Market Bldg (Breakfast) > Embarcadero Ctr > Chinatown >
Coit Tower > Lombard Street > Fishermans Wharf > Ghirardelli (Dinner)

Sunday May 24

- Lyons Street / Steps (2.7 mi) [Off California Street]
- Alamo Square Park (2.4 mi) [Off Hayes Street]
- Haight-Ashbury (3.4 mi) [West Side of GG Park]
- San Francisco Zoo (12.6 mi) [Sloat Blvd. at the Great Highway]
- Twin Peaks (4.4 mi) [501 Twin Peaks Blvd]

*Suggested Route: Breakfast near Hotel > Lyon Street Steps > Alamo Square
> Haight-Ashbury > Zoo > Twin Peaks (Picnic)

Monday May 25

- Palace of Fine Arts (3.5 mi) [3301 Lyon St]
- Baker Beach (7.0 mi) [1504 Pershing Dr, Golden Gate National Recreation Area]
- Golden Gate Bridge (5.2 mi)
- Muir Woods (16.7 mi) [1 Muir Woods Rd, Mill Valley, CA]

*Suggested Route: Breakfast near hotel > Palace of Fine Arts > Baker Beach
> Golden Gate Bridge > Muir Woods > Dinner Back in San Fran

Tuesday May 26

- Castello di Amorosa [4050 St Helena Hwy, Calistoga, CA 94515 (707) 967-6272]
- Bouchon Restaurant [6534 Washington St, Yountville, CA 94599]
- Celadon Restaurant [Napa River Inn, 500 Main St, Napa, CA 94559 (707) 254-9690]
- Super Secret Birthday Surprise
***Undisclosed Time/Location/Event**

*Suggested Route: Let the wine tell us what to do

Wednesday May 27

- Golden Gate Park
- Academy of Sciences [55 Music Concourse Dr]
- Legion of Honor [100 34th Ave]

*Suggested Route: Golden Gate Park > Legion of Honor > Academy of Sciences

No Animals Were Harmed in the Making of This Website
